name: 馬肇石
objective: 本課程利用三學年四學期的時間，培養學生簡易法文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對法國文化的認識與興趣，提供學生法文的基礎知識（包括字母、讀音、語法等）。授課內容：1.個人（姓名、數字、身體重要部位、職業、年齡等），2.家庭（親屬稱謂、住宅式樣、個性、求學、介紹他人等），3.日常生活對話（打電話、道謝、道歉、討論天氣、討論日常活動、常用物品、約會、重要場所、用餐、提出邀請等）。
schedule:
class 1-3: review all the French of the first year.
class 4: currencies, ask prices, 4 countries, devoir/falloir.
class 5: ask directions in a city (turn left, go strait, etc.)
class 6: imperatif, orders, orientations.
class 7: directions on a map, places in a city, going to a place.
class 8: house: rooms, furnitures, presentation of a house.
class 9: mid-term exam.
class 10: travel: general vocabulary, judgement of places, like/do not like.
class 11: ne...plus/ne...jamais/ne...personne/personne...ne/review judgement of places.
class 12: ne...rien/rien...ne/imperatif.
class 13: imperatif grammar and practice, posifif/negatif arguments practice.
class 14: before and after with imparfait, post-card.
class 15: articles/food vacabulary.
class 16: table setting, dishes, how to order, pas de/plus de.
class 17: the day of Gerard with imparfait, passe compose, all the food vacabulary (review all together).
class 18: final exam.
